attributes.action: Take the UK out of the EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The UK should leave the EU; the many £Billions the UK makes in contributions
to this overly bureaucratic institution would be better spent on our own  infrastructures, simultaneously freeing us from its unsuitable laws, diktats and
red-tape that's choking our businesses and preventing our people from enjoying
their own democratic freedoms.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
